comp_req__persistency__async_api_v2.content: The component shall provide an asynchronous API in addition to the standard API.
comp_req__persistency__async_api_v2.title: Async API

comp_req__persistency__callback_support_.content: The component shall provide an API for registering callbacks that are triggered by data change events.
comp_req__persistency__callback_support_.title: Callback Support

comp_req__persistency__concurrency_v2.content:
The component shall implement thread-safe mechanisms to enable concurrent
access to data without data races.
comp_req__persistency__concurrency_v2.title: Concurrency

comp_req__persistency__constraints_v2.content:
The component shall allow configuration of KVS constraints at compile-time
using source code constants or at runtime using a configuration file.
comp_req__persistency__constraints_v2.title: Constraint Configuration

comp_req__persistency__default_val_chksu.content:
The component shall secure the configuration file for default values with an
associated checksum file when default values are stored in a file.
comp_req__persistency__default_val_chksu.title: Default Value Checksum

comp_req__persistency__default_value_cfg.content:
The component shall allow configuration of default values in code or in a
separate configuration file.
comp_req__persistency__default_value_cfg.title: Default Value Config

comp_req__persistency__default_value_que.content: The component shall provide an API to retrieve default values.
comp_req__persistency__default_value_que.title: Default Value Query

comp_req__persistency__default_value_typ.content:
The component shall accept default values of only permitted value data
types.
comp_req__persistency__default_value_typ.title: Default Value Datatypes

comp_req__persistency__eng_mode_v2.content:
The component shall provide an engineering mode that can be enabled during
build time to display debugging and internal information.
comp_req__persistency__eng_mode_v2.title: Engineering Mode

comp_req__persistency__field_mode_v2.content:
The component shall provide a field mode that can be enabled during build
time to restrict access as much as possible.
comp_req__persistency__field_mode_v2.title: Field Mode

comp_req__persistency__key_encoding_v2.content: The component shall encode each key as valid UTF-8.
comp_req__persistency__key_encoding_v2.title: Key Encoding

comp_req__persistency__key_length_v2.content: The component shall limit the maximum length of a key to 32 bytes.
comp_req__persistency__key_length_v2.title: Key Length

comp_req__persistency__key_naming_v2.content: The component shall accept keys that consist solely of alphanumeric characters, underscores, or dashes.
comp_req__persistency__key_naming_v2.title: Key Naming

comp_req__persistency__key_uniqueness_v2.content: The component shall guarantee that each key is unique.
comp_req__persistency__key_uniqueness_v2.title: Key Uniqueness

comp_req__persistency__multi_instance_v2.content:
The component shall manage all runtime variables within an instance to
enable creation and use of multiple KVS instances concurrently within a
single software architecture element.
comp_req__persistency__multi_instance_v2.title: Multi-Instance

comp_req__persistency__permission_contro.content:
The component shall rely on the underlying filesystem for access and
permission management and shall not implement its own access or permission
controls.
comp_req__persistency__permission_contro.title: Permission Control

comp_req__persistency__permission_err_hn.content:
The component shall report any access or permission errors encountered at
the filesystem level to the application.
comp_req__persistency__permission_err_hn.title: Permission Error Handling

comp_req__persistency__pers_data_csum_v2.content:
The component shall generate a checksum for each data file and shall store
it alongside the data.
comp_req__persistency__pers_data_csum_v2.title: Persistent Data Storage Checksum Write

comp_req__persistency__pers_data_csum_vr.content: The component shall verify the checksum when loading data.
comp_req__persistency__pers_data_csum_vr.title: Persistent Data Storage Checksum Verify

comp_req__persistency__pers_data_schema_.content:
The component shall use a JSON file storage format that enables the
application to implement versioning, including upgrade and downgrade paths,
as needed.
comp_req__persistency__pers_data_schema_.title: Persistent Data Schema

comp_req__persistency__pers_data_store_b.content: The component shall use the file API to persist data.
comp_req__persistency__pers_data_store_b.title: Persistent Data Storage Backend

comp_req__persistency__pers_data_store_f.content: The component shall use the JSON data format to persist data.
comp_req__persistency__pers_data_store_f.title: Persistent Data Storage Format

comp_req__persistency__pers_data_version.content: The component shall not provide built-in versioning.
comp_req__persistency__pers_data_version.title: Persistent Data Versioning

comp_req__persistency__persist_data_com_.content: The component shall use the file API and the JSON data format to persist data.
comp_req__persistency__persist_data_com_.title: Persistent Data Storage Components

comp_req__persistency__snapshot_creation.content: The component shall create a snapshot each time data is stored.
comp_req__persistency__snapshot_creation.title: Snapshot Creation

comp_req__persistency__snapshot_delete_v.content: The component shall allow deletion of individual snapshots.
comp_req__persistency__snapshot_delete_v.title: Snapshot Deletion

comp_req__persistency__snapshot_id_v2.content: The component shall assign the ID 1 to the newest snapshot and shall increment the IDs of older snapshots accordingly.
comp_req__persistency__snapshot_id_v2.title: Snapshot IDs

comp_req__persistency__snapshot_max_num_.content: The component shall maintain a configurable maximum number of snapshots.
comp_req__persistency__snapshot_max_num_.title: Snapshot Maximum Number

comp_req__persistency__snapshot_restore_.content: The component shall allow restoration of a snapshot by its ID.
comp_req__persistency__snapshot_restore_.title: Snapshot Restore

comp_req__persistency__snapshot_rotate_v.content: The component shall rotate and delete the oldest snapshot when the maximum number is reached.
comp_req__persistency__snapshot_rotate_v.title: Snapshot Rotation

comp_req__persistency__value_data_types_.content:
The component shall accept only values of the following data types: Number,
String, Null, Array[Value], or Dictionary{Key:Value}.
comp_req__persistency__value_data_types_.title: Value Data Types

comp_req__persistency__value_default_v2.content:
The component shall support unset values and shall provide a default value
when a value is unset.
comp_req__persistency__value_default_v2.title: Value Default

comp_req__persistency__value_length_v2.content: The component shall limit the maximum length of a value to 1024 bytes.
comp_req__persistency__value_length_v2.title: Value Length

comp_req__persistency__value_reset_v2.content:
The component shall allow resetting a value to its default if a default is
defined.
comp_req__persistency__value_reset_v2.title: Value Reset

comp_req__persistency__value_serialize_v.content: The component shall serialize and deserialize all values to and from JSON.
comp_req__persistency__value_serialize_v.title: Value Serialization

arch.description: Mapping of uml key to uml content.

constraints.description: List of constraint names, which are defined for this need.

constraints_error.description: An error message set if any constraint failed, and `error_message` field is set in config.

constraints_passed.description: True if all constraints passed, False if any failed, None if not yet checked.

constraints_results.description: Mapping of constraint name, to check name, to result.

docname.description: Name of the document where the need is defined (None if external).

doctype.description: Type of the document where the need is defined, e.g. '.rst'.

external_css.description: CSS class name, added to the external reference.

external_url.description: URL of the need, if it is an external need.

has_dead_links.description: True if any links reference need ids that are not found in the need list.

has_forbidden_dead_links.description: True if any links reference need ids that are not found in the need list, and the link type does not allow dead links.

is_external.description: If true, no node is created and need is referencing external url.

is_modified.description: Whether the need was modified by needextend.

is_need.description: Whether the need is a need.

is_part.description: Whether the need is a part.

jinja_content.description: Whether the content should be pre-processed by jinja.

layout.description: Key of the layout, which is used to render the need.

lineno.description: Line number where the need is defined (None if external).

parts.description: Mapping of parts, a.k.a. sub-needs, IDs to data that overrides the need's data

signature.description: Derived from a docutils desc_name node.

style.description: Comma-separated list of CSS classes (all appended by `needs_style_`).
